懶人包.definition: (Tw) (neologism c. 2007) information presented in easily assimilable form (digest, summary, infographic etc)

懶得.definition: to not feel like (doing sth); to be disinclined to

懶得搭理.definition: not wishing to acknowledge sb; unwilling to respond

懶貓.definition: drowsy or slow-moving cat; (fig.) a lazybones

懶辦法.definition: to loaf about; lazy; to hang around (and cause trouble to everyone)

懶音.definition: (linguistics) phonological reduction; lazy pronunciation; allegro speech

懶驢上磨屎尿多.pinyin: lan3 lu:2 shang4 mo4 shi3 niao4 duo1
懶驢上磨屎尿多.definition: (proverb) A lazy person will find many excuses to delay working; lit. When a lazy donkey is turning a grindstone, it takes a lot of time off for peeing and pooing
